snippet: The Indianapolis Colts and the Houston Texans have disappointed greatly after entering the season with playoff aspirations. This game is up for grabs.
abstract: Preview of upcoming NFL game between Indianapolis Colts and Houston Texans.
lead_paragraph: The Indianapolis Colts and the Houston Texans have disappointed greatly after entering the season with playoff aspirations. This game is up for grabs.

headline.main: N.F.L. Thursday Matchup: Colts (2-2) at Texans (1-3)
